 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: /**
 4:  * Class WordDirRelsDirDocumentStructureDocFile
 5:  * @version 1.0.2
 6:  * @author v.raskin
 7:  * @package vsword.structure
 8: */
 9: class WordDirRelsDirDocumentStructureDocFile extends StructureDocFile {
10: 
11:     const TYPE_THEME1 = 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships/theme';    
12:     const TYPE_STYLESWITHEFFECTS = 'http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/2007/relationships/stylesWithEffects';  
13:     const TYPE_FONTTABLE = 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships/fontTable';
14:     const TYPE_STYLES = 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships/styles';
15:     const TYPE_NUMBERING = 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships/numbering';
16:     const TYPE_IMAGE = 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships/image';
17:     const TYPE_WEBSETTINGS = 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships/webSettings';
18:     const TYPE_SETTINGS = 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/officeDocument/2006/relationships/settings';
19:     
20:     public $stack = array();
21:     
22:     public function __construct() {
23:         $this->name = 'document.xml.rels'; 
24:                 //set default rels
25:         $this->registerRels("theme/theme1.xml", self::TYPE_THEME1);
26:         $this->registerRels("stylesWithEffects.xml", self::TYPE_STYLESWITHEFFECTS);
27:         $this->registerRels("fontTable.xml", self::TYPE_FONTTABLE);
28:         $this->registerRels("styles.xml", self::TYPE_STYLES);
29:         $this->registerRels("numbering.xml", self::TYPE_NUMBERING);
30:         $this->registerRels("webSettings.xml", self::TYPE_WEBSETTINGS);
31:         $this->registerRels("settings.xml", self::TYPE_SETTINGS);
32:     }
33:     
34:   
35:     
36:     /**
37:      * 
38:      * @param type $target
39:      * @return array
40:      */
41:     public function registerImage($target) {  
42:         return $this->registerRels('media/'.basename($target), self::TYPE_IMAGE);  
43:     }
44:     
45:     /**
46:     * @return array
47:     */
48:     public function registerRels($target, $type) {
49:         if($this->validateType($type)) {    
50:              $key = 'rId'.(sizeof($this->stack) + 1);    
51:              $this->stack[$key] = array($target, $type, $key); 
52:              return $this->stack[$key];
53:         }
54:         return NULL;
55:     }
56:     
57:     /**
58:      * 
59:      * @param string $type
60:      * @return boolean
61:      */
62:     public function validateType($type) {
63:         return in_array($type, array(
64:             self::TYPE_THEME1,
65:             self::TYPE_STYLESWITHEFFECTS,
66:             self::TYPE_FONTTABLE,
67:             self::TYPE_STYLES,
68:             self::TYPE_NUMBERING,
69:             self::TYPE_IMAGE,
70:             self::TYPE_WEBSETTINGS,
71:             self::TYPE_SETTINGS,
72:         ));
73:     }
74:     
75:     
76:     public function getContent() { 
77:         $strings = array(
78:             $this->getXMLHeader(),
79:             '<Relationships xmlns="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships">',
80:         );
81:         foreach($this->stack as $item) { 
82:             list($target, $type, $key) = $item;
83:             $strings[] = '<Relationship Id="'.$key.'" Type="'.$type.'" Target="'.$target.'"/>';
84:         }
85:         $strings[] = '</Relationships>';
86:         return  join('', $strings);
87:     }
88: }
